PathOfBuilding.Notes:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ^x70FF70-=Other Options to Level as=-^7 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
speed run strat is dead the wheel was moved and I forgot my bad
Absolution^7 linked with ^x7070FF50% of Physical Damage is Converted to Lightning^7-^x7070FF^xE05030Minion Damage^7^7-^x7070FF^xD02090Spell Echo^7 ^7 -this is one of the stronger ways to level as minions if not the only one I can think of these days.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ^x70FF70-=My Transfigured Gem Plan=-^7 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- The good news is that^x70FF70 Mirror Arrow and Blink Arrow of Bombardment^7 can be turned into one another by vendoring the gem and an ^x7070FFAlteration orb^7 to flip the version from ^x70FF70Mirror Arrow-->Blink Arrow or Blink Arrow--->Mirror Arrow^7
The other good news is that because this is ^xD02090THE ONLY^7 transfigured gem with 2 versions it's very easy to either farm from lab or just buy from people.
For example last league you could buy this gem on leaguestart by ^x70FF70Act 5^7 for ^xAF60252c in Softcore Necropolis^7 so I personally would just play firestorm until I could buy the gem instead of farming lab now. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ^x70FF70 -=Basic Bama Info=-^7 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ^x70FF70Rain of arrows^7 is the skill ^x70FF70BAMA^7 uses, without aoe it hits around 9ish times with all 3 summoned
but with ^x7070FFconc effect^7 it's closer to 3.5+ which ends up being 10-11 but it's REALLY hard to know how often, BUT it is confirmed that ^x7070FFconc effect^7 IS BETTER for single target endgame bossing
however in normal maps just taking ^x7070FF30% aoe node^7 is fine for clear :)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ^x70FF70-= Cheap Animate Guardian Gear =-^7 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
^xAF6025Leer Cast ^7 ^xAF6025Dying Breathe^7 ^xAF6025Belly of the beast^7 ^xAF6025Southbound ^7 ^xFFFF77Boots with chaos resist^7
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ^x70FF70-= SPECTRES AND LOCATIONS =-^7 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ^xD02090Wild Bristle Matron^7 (the big purple bear) From Tier 3^x7070FF Harvest^7. When he roars he does a stupid as fuck ^xD0209040% reduced action speed slow^7. I use this against bosses when I feel like my damage is more than enough.
^xFFFF77Spectral Leader^7 can only be obtained from^xD02090 t17 maps^7 OR if you allocate ^xD02090Invasive Adversaries^7 on the atlas tree. He casts srs and runs around but his buff is ^xD0209020% increased action speed^7 for allies inside the aura he provides.
^xB97123Arena Master^7 from ^xB97123Drox maps^7 the buff is 20% increased Damage, Attack, Cast and Movement Speed. BUT the uptime is only ^x7070FF4 seconds on a 8 second cd^7 still worth running though for the damage.
